title: UI: Surface tag/priority change requests and enable owner approval/rejection

sections.text: Add UI components on the Issue detail page to display pending tag/priority change requests created when non-owners attempt edits (per GOLD-172). Field owners should be able to approve or reject each request, with clear visibility into requester, proposed value, source, and timestamp. Ensure approved changes update the Issue immediately and rejected requests remain in history with a rejection reason.
